name: TMAssetsPickerController
summary: iOS 8 control that allows picking multiple photos and videos from user's photo library based on Photos.framework
description:
AssetsPickerController is an iOS controller that allows picking
                    		multiple photos and videos from user's photo library.
	                    	The usage and look-and-feel just similar to UIImagePickerController.
    	                	It uses **ARC**. Requires **Photos** framework and iOS 8.
